    • Method Detail

      • onModuleReady

        void onModuleReady(BandyerModule module)

        Called when a module is ready

        N.B. This method will be called when the module is ready to be used no matter what status it is. For example if a Module can be always used while the device is connected or not to internet this method will be called as soon the module has been initialized. Or If a Module to be used needs to be online then it will await the connection before calling this method

        Parameters:
        module - the module that is ready

      • onModulePaused

        void onModulePaused(BandyerModule module)

        Called when a module is paused

        Parameters:
        module - the module that has been paused

      • onModuleFailed

        void onModuleFailed(BandyerModule module,
                    java.lang.Throwable throwable)

        Called when a module has failed the initialization

        Parameters:
        module - the module that has failed
        throwable - Throwable reason of failure

      • onModuleStatusChanged

        void onModuleStatusChanged(BandyerModule module,
                           BandyerModuleStatus moduleStatus)

        Called when a module has changed status

        Parameters:
        module - the module
        moduleStatus - status of the module
